item.description:
TROY BROWN Is Back!!!

Anyone who has heard Troy knows what a fantastic showman he is. He will have you off your feet and dancing, that is a promise! He regularly plays in Hartford, CT and Massachusetts, as well as the surrounding area....and he is fabulous! His stylings are rhythym and blues flavored jazz...a little Motown...alot of funk! Oh, yeah!!!

If you were at my last two Lingering Summer Picnics, you will remember him. He is THE MAN. Come out and join him..

THE MARQUEE...

Brand new, ultra trendy lounge in Waterbury... perfect pre-game spot or great place to go and talk over a martini...the Miami style design and modern decor call for a sexy crowd ranging from 21-50+...with a variety of food and specialty drinks such as Marnie's Famous Mojito, there is a flexible atmoshere that will attract a mature crowd...music is commercial house and a mix of other upbeat tunes for most of the weekend...young energetic owners, looking to bring a new dimesnion to nitelife in Waterbury...located right next to the Palace Theater, come and check out what the Marquee has to offer. Plenty of parking across the street.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri, or the Meetup Sign...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: TROY BROWN @ The Marquee Cafe in Waterbury!!!
